attributes.title: I am absolutely disgusted.
attributes.review: This app is a disgrace to humanity. It called me slurs and dishonored my name and family. This app is not immaculate. 0/10 would not recommend. I wish I could give it zero stars.

attributes.title: This is bad
attributes.review: It wastes sooo much space and uses so much data! For the info it gives it is not the your looking for. Please in al needs don’t waste time on this app it has some work to do. And I would rate it a 0 if I could.

attributes.title: Worlds worst app
attributes.review: I can’t even begin to describe how awful of an app this is. To even imagine somebody downloading it makes me sick to my stomach. If you’re thinking about it, just don’t. It’s a complete waste of your precious precious time in this universe. The man this app supports is I believe the single worst president our country has ever seen. That fact that some people are even thinking about re-election him is just mind boggling to me. He is built on hate and has shown over and over again that his only goal is to harm marginalized communities in this country even more. He is trying to abolish the LGBT+ rights we have despite promising to do his best to protect us. He is sending only more hate and prejudice to our black and brown community’s. Activity harming the BLM movement by not speaking up and ordering cops to attack peaceful protesters. He is sending innocent refugees who only seek a better life in this country to what are what has been described by the New York Times as concentration camps, where god knows what is being done to them. How people still stand for this, I don’t know. But I do know that we won’t go down without a fight. Don’t download this app.

attributes.title: trump needs to go away 💕🥰😍
attributes.review: so first off once I downloaded this my microwave went crazy and blasted the song “somebody come get her” and wouldn’t shut off. then my stove ‘s door opened and closed repeatedly without anyone there. then my phone went blank like it was hacked. it all only stopped once I liked every song fairy hate comment on the trump campaign on instagram. thanks trump! now go away please 🥰💕😍

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP
attributes.review: I am absolutely disappointed with this app. It asks you a various amount of personal questions and I do not agree with this at all. All the trump supporters DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. I later on got hacked and all my emails erased. I started receiving lots weird emails and messages. It hacked my phone and now I lost a lot of my things. This app should not be on Apple. It is a risk to people’s privacy and information.

attributes.title: Oh hell Na
attributes.review: This app is all but lies. I can not STAND lies. There was a horrible picture of a orange cry baby. I DONT LIKE ORANGES OR CRY BABIES.
